hero.subtitle: We help financial advisors create a personalized, comprehensive financial plan in 24 hours
hero.asSeenOn: As seen on Michael Kitces tech map

homePage.usedBy: Used by AUM and Fee-only financial advisors

theProblem.title: The Problem
theProblem.subtitle: Creating a financial plan takes a lot of time, which can be spent on winning new clients
box: You’ve heard that outsourcing creating a plan is expensive and complicated
You don’t want to compromise on quality and you want things done a certain way
You’re busy, and it takes time and effort to find the right partner

poweredBy.title: Powered by humans. Enhanced by tools.
poweredBy.subtitle: Our financial plans are created by humans, and we use compliant automations to help make planning faster

ourSolution.title: Our Solution
ourSolution.subtitle: We’ve built an easy way to delegate creating and updating personalized, comprehensive financial plans

tabs.heading: Step 1: You’ll share a brief
tabs.title: You’ll brief us on your client strategy, and how you want the plan created
tabs.subtitle: We’ll learn what you want to achieve with your client and you can share supporting information and documentation via a secure, end-to-end encrypted connection.

tabs.heading: Step 2: We’ll create a first draft
tabs.title: We’ll create a first draft of the plan in 24 hours
tabs.subtitle: We’ll take the direction, information, and your plan creation preferences to produce a first draft within 24 hours

tabs.heading: Step 3: We’ll finalise the plan
tabs.title: We’ll walk you through the plan, and finalize - ready to present
tabs.subtitle: We’ll walk you through the financial plan and brief you on how it was constructed. We’ll implement any changes and finanlize making it ready to deliver to your client

box.title: Real time support
box.subtitle: You can reach us in real time via chat or phone at any stage during the plan creation process

box.title: Built in-house
box.subtitle: Our planning team is full integrated and in-house

box.title: Made in the USA
box.subtitle: Our planning team is based in the United States of America

contact.title: Have a question or want to learn more? Contact a member of the team

security.subtitle: We prioritize your data security through rigorous measures and advanced technologies, ensuring confidentiality and integrity at every step.
security.button: Check out the full security overview

questions.title: What planning software do you use to create financial plans?
questions.body: We use inStream to create the core of the financial plan. Depending on the plan complexity and requirement, we use additional tools to create comprehensive financial plans.

questions.title: I want to build the financial plan in my tools - what do you support?
questions.body: We can create and update financial plans in RightCapital, eMoney, and MoneyGuidePro. We’re not limited to using these tools, for example, if you use Morningstar or Kwanti for portfolio analysis, or Monarch for cash flow planning, we can work with a variety of tools.

questions.title: What planning areas do you cover?
questions.body: We can create and update financial plans in RightCapital, eMoney, and MoneyGuidePro. We’re not limited to using these tools, for example, if you use Morningstar or Kwanti for portfolio analysis, or Monarch for cash flow planning, we can work with a variety of tools.

questions.title: Do you outsource any part of the process?
questions.body: 100% of the process is handled by our in-house team and we do not work with any 3rd parties at any stage. Our financial planners are based in the United States of America.

questions.title: Are your automated tools secure and compliant?
questions.body: Our tools are built from the ground up with financial advisors in mind, and follow and exceed security and compliance standards. We’re currently undergoing a voluntary audit to obtain SOC2 certification, which can be provided on request.

questions.title: Are you insured?
questions.body: We are fully insured, most importantly covering privacy, and security.

q1.title: Can paraplanner.ai customize solutions for specific advisor needs?
q1.body: Absolutely! We collaborate closely with advisors to tailor our solutions to their unique requirements, ensuring optimal performance and client satisfaction.

q2.title: How does paraplanner.ai handle client data privacy?
q2.body: We adhere to strict privacy regulations and best practices, implementing robust data protection measures to safeguard client privacy and confidentiality.

q3.title: How can paraplanner.ai assist financial advisors?
q3.body: We provide cutting-edge tools and personalized support to streamline client management and optimize operational efficiency.

q4.title: What sets paraplanner.ai apart from competitors?
q4.body: Our innovative solutions combine advanced technology with industry expertise, empowering financial advisors to outperform in a competitive market.

q5.title: Can paraplanner.ai integrate with existing advisor platforms?
q5.body: Yes, our flexible integration options ensure seamless compatibility with a wide range of advisor platforms for enhanced workflow integration.

q6.title: Is paraplanner.ai suitable for independent advisors?
q6.body: Absolutely! Our tailored solutions cater to the unique needs of independent advisors, offering scalable support to drive business growth and client satisfaction.

q7.title: How does paraplanner.ai prioritize data security?
q7.body: Data security is paramount to us. We employ robust encryption protocols and strict access controls to safeguard sensitive client information.

q8.title: What support does paraplanner.ai provide during onboarding?
q8.body: Our dedicated onboarding team offers comprehensive training and personalized guidance to ensure a smooth transition and maximize platform utilization.
